headline: EPAM Systems (EPAM): Assessing Valuation Following NEORIS Unification and New Strategic Partnerships
summary: EPAM Systems has merged its engineering, consulting and AI services under the unified EPAM NEORIS brand across Ibero-America. The goal is to accelerate digital transformation for Spanish- and Portuguese-speaking clients. This announcement highlights EPAM's growing client and partner network in thriving markets. See our latest analysis for EPAM Systems. EPAM’s push into Ibero-America and its deepening partnerships with major tech platforms have landed against a tough market backdrop, with the...

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Walking a Fine Line
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
